description: Biosensor system that detects a set of molecular biomarkers for cystic fibrosis (CF) and chronical obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) in exhaled breath condensate EBC. The markers hexanal (Hex), 3-nitrotyrosine (3-NT), and human neutrophil elastase (HNE) were selected on basis of a literature study and input by the medical partners of the Remedia consortium.
name: Biosensor
